main event: A reddish-orange colored object, resembling a plate, was observed hovering under high temperature and described as possibly being a balloon, based on the observations noted in the report.
interesting points: The object was observed for 20 seconds, hovering in clear weather,The shape was likened to a plate with two suckers, one stopping the other,The size of the object was estimated to be similar to a dime,It was reported as an unreliable sighting due to the time lapse before the report,The report was part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings.
witness description: The observers included a husband and wife, with the husband noted to be a Major of Infantry during World War II.
